D

doorToReveal(int, int) - Static method in class MontyHall
this method finds the door that is neither the car or the users choices.

G

game() - Static method in class MontyHall
This is the game method which actually runs the game It starts by picking a random number from 1-3 to be the car door.

M

This is the main method that calls the other methods.
